name: Pineapple Upside-Down Cheesecake
author: Christopher
summary: Fruity and creamy! Just oh so delicious!
ingredients: 2 (8 ounce) cans pineapple slices, drained well
directions: Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Mix 2 tablespoons butter and brown sugar together in a 9-inch round cake pan until blended; spread mixture to evenly cover bottom of pan
Top with pineapple slices; place 1 cherry in the center of each slice
Combine graham cracker crumbs, 3 tablespoons white sugar, and remaining 3 tablespoons butter in a small bowl; mix well
Beat cream cheese and 3/4 cup white sugar in a bowl until blended
Add sour cream and vanilla extract; mix well
Add eggs, 1 at a time; mix on low speed after each addition until blended
Bake in the preheated oven until the center is almost set, 55 minutes to 1 hour
Run a knife around the inside edge of pan to loosen cake
Allow to cool completely, about 30 minutes
Invert onto a serving plate; remove pan
